An update</title> <link href="http://hdl.handle.net/2160/319" rel="alternate"/> <author> <name>Murtagh, John</name> </author> <id>http://hdl.handle.net/2160/319</id> <updated>2014-10-22T11:36:16Z</updated> <published>2007-07-11T15:07:01Z</published> <summary type="text">Brunel University Research Archive: Mandate and RAE. An update Murtagh, John Brunel University's Repository Manager John Murtagh gives an update on their repository, how it is used to support the RAE, and a mandate they have issued. </summary> <dc:date>2007-07-11T15:07:01Z</dc:date> </entry> <entry> <title>Open Repository, Open Source</title> <link href="http://hdl.handle.net/2160/318" rel="alternate"/> <author> <name>Triggs, Graham</name> </author> <id>http://hdl.handle.net/2160/318</id> <updated>2007-07-12T01:00:26Z</updated> <published>2007-07-11T14:57:51Z</published> <summary type="text">Open Repository, Open Source Triggs, Graham A presentation by Graham Triggs of BioMed Central's 'Open Repository' team about their work and contribution to DSpace. </summary> <dc:date>2007-07-11T14:57:51Z</dc:date> </entry> <entry> <title>Persistent identification and storage abstraction in DSpace</title> <link href="http://hdl.handle.net/2160/317" rel="alternate"/> <author> <name>Rutherford, James</name> </author> <id>http://hdl.handle.net/2160/317</id> <updated>2007-07-12T01:00:26Z</updated> <published>2007-07-11T14:38:22Z</published> <summary type="text">Persistent identification and storage abstraction in DSpace Rutherford, James A presentation by James Rutherford of HP Labs exploring the issues of identification and storage abstraction in DSpace. </summary> <dc:date>2007-07-11T14:38:22Z</dc:date> </entry> </feed>
